message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, $11,500 is still a bit higher than I'd like to spend. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $11,500 is the lowest I'm willing to go at this time. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
